title: Is anyone else lagging in ban phase/champ select?
body:
Literally every time I queue up for a game, the "MATCH FOUND!" pop-up takes near forever. But, if I'm fast enough to accept, the entire ban phase is complete lag. By the time the game has recognized that I have declared a champion, my ban pick has already passed/ran out of time. And this happens often so the queue dodge timers are freaking tilting me so hard! What am I doing wrong? If it helps, comment any information you may need to help me. Thanks in advance.

P.S. I already sent a bug report hours ago. Maybe the forums will give me more direct help.

replies.body:
Are you running a lower-spec computer? If so, you may want to hop into your game settings (cog in the top-right of the client) and checking the boxes for *low-spec mode* and to *disable animations*. I've provided a screenshot below so you can see what I mean:

http://image.prntscr.com/image/598e949fe2904c85b3220875cf13760f.png

Let me know if this improved your performance in champ select.
